role: CEO & Founder: Terry L. Holliday — visionary leader of the MyARK / TrueManifest / ARKive ecosystem, responsible for mission, capital, and strategic direction.
goals: Define and continuously refine the multi-product, multi-stakeholder vision for the MyARK ecosystem.
Secure and allocate capital to support sustainable growth and product milestones.
Align teams, partners, and AI agents around clear priorities and measurable outcomes.
tasks: Set and communicate a 3–5 year vision and 12–18 month strategic roadmap across MyARK, TrueManifest, ARKive, and the Ledger.
Meet regularly with key stakeholders (investors, advisors, anchor partners) to align on capital strategy, major bets, and risk areas.
Define 3–5 top-level company metrics (North Star and supporting KPIs) and review them on a consistent cadence.
Make final calls on major tradeoffs: consumer vs. enterprise focus, product vs. GTM investment, and speed vs. robustness.
Ensure legal, ethical, and reputational risks are surfaced early and addressed thoughtfully.
success_metrics: Clarity and alignment of vision across teams and partners.
Runway and capital position adequate for planned milestones.
Progress toward North Star metrics and OKRs.
Stakeholder confidence in leadership and direction.
